text: 嗎？這個是叫family suites嗎？
pinyin: ma ？ zhè gè shì jiào family suites ma ？
english: ? Is this called family suites?

text: 那其實我們這次呢是family trip
pinyin: nà qí shí wǒ men zhè cì ne shì family trip
english: So actually our trip this time is a family trip

text: 不用online reservation
pinyin: bù yòng online reservation
english: No online reservation required

text: 這個是family suites好像
pinyin: zhè gè shì family suites hǎo xiàng
english: This seems to be family suites

text: 然後現在我妹妹還在做checking
pinyin: rán hòu xiàn zài wǒ mèi mèi hái zài zuò checking
english: And now my sister is still doing checking

text: 這個Skyworld Hotel的
pinyin: zhè gè Skyworld Hotel de
english: This Skyworld Hotel

text: 誒你不要看浪費我的Memory咧
pinyin: éi nǐ bú yào kàn làng fèi wǒ de Memory liě
english: Hey, don’t waste my memory by looking at it.

text: 誒，那個，他沒有放垃圾袋的做麼？
pinyin: éi ， nà gè ， tā méi yǒu fàng lā jī dài de zuò me ？
english: Hey, um, didn't he put a garbage bag in it?

text: 我們今天就以這樣的方式來結尾啦
pinyin: wǒ men jīn tiān jiù yǐ zhè yàng de fāng shì lái jié wěi la
english: This is how we end today

text: 噢它是類似3D的那種電影的感覺
pinyin: ō tā shì lèi shì 3D de nà zhǒng diàn yǐng de gǎn jué
english: Oh, it feels like a 3D movie

text: 有類似Zootopia的感覺
pinyin: yǒu lèi shì Zootopia de gǎn jué
english: It feels like Zootopia

text: 還有她的兩個兒子跟我的小番薯
pinyin: hái yǒu tā de liǎng gè ér zi gēn wǒ de xiǎo fān shǔ
english: And her two sons and my little sweet potato

text: 歡迎來到Z頻道的大馬番薯日記
pinyin: huān yíng lái dào Z pín dào de dà mǎ fān shǔ rì jì
english: Welcome to Channel Z’s Malaysian Sweet Potato Diary

text: 等一下我們玩的就是這個設施啦
pinyin: děng yí xià wǒ men wán de jiù shì zhè gè shè shī la
english: Wait a minute, this is the facility we are going to play in.

text: 小番薯，你講我們下一部電影見
pinyin: xiǎo fān shǔ ， nǐ jiǎng wǒ men xià yī bù diàn yǐng jiàn
english: Xiaofanshu, tell me we’ll see you in the next movie

text: 這邊是有那個QR code的
pinyin: zhè biān shì yǒu nà gè QR code de
english: There is that QR code here

text: 我們到雲頂（我們到雲頂了）
pinyin: wǒ men dào yún dǐng （ wǒ men dào yún dǐng le ）
english: We arrived at Genting (We arrived at Genting)

text: So...應該有排等了的啦
pinyin: So... yīng gāi yǒu pái děng le de la
english: So...there should be a queue.

text: OK我們現在就要開始這個了
pinyin: OK wǒ men xiàn zài jiù yào kāi shǐ zhè gè le
english: OK we're going to start this now

text: 所以你看我們的頭有點濕濕的
pinyin: suǒ yǐ nǐ kàn wǒ men de tóu yǒu diǎn shī shī de
english: So you see our heads are a little wet

text: 等下這個表哥表妹就要上去了
pinyin: děng xià zhè gè biǎo gē biǎo mèi jiù yào shàng qù le
english: Wait a minute, this cousin is going to go up.

text: Let's go(Ok)
pinyin: Let's go(Ok)
english: Let's go(Ok)

text: OK OK來我們去找他們
pinyin: OK OK lái wǒ men qù zhǎo tā men
english: OK OK, come on, let's go find them.

text: 我畫的Spiderman
pinyin: wǒ huà de Spiderman
english: Spiderman I drew

text: 我覺得他們三個可以睡上面
pinyin: wǒ jué dé tā men sān gè kě yǐ shuì shàng miàn
english: I think the three of them can sleep up there

text: 很光 那快點 去準備先啦
pinyin: hěn guāng   nà kuài diǎn   qù zhǔn bèi xiān la
english: It's very light. Come on, go get ready.

text: 在上面應該是不可以拍照的
pinyin: zài shàng miàn yīng gāi shì bù kě yǐ pāi zhào de
english: You shouldn't be allowed to take pictures up there.

text: 想到要跟這些小瓜一整天哦
pinyin: xiǎng dào yào gēn zhè xiē xiǎo guā yī zhěng tiān ó
english: I thought about spending the whole day with these little melons.

text: 怪不得一直找都找不到啦
pinyin: guài bù dé yì zhí zhǎo dōu zhǎo bú dào la
english: No wonder I can’t find it even though I’ve been looking for it.

text: 爸爸，沒有摩托車坐咧～
pinyin: bà bà ， méi yǒu mó tuō chē zuò liě ～
english: Dad, there is no motorcycle to ride on~
